title: EYL #179 Jax Jones on Artists Selling Their Catalogs, The Music Business, & The UK
itunes:title: EYL #179 Jax Jones on Artists Selling Their Catalogs, The Music Business, & The UK
description:
Jax Jones is a UK musical and business legend.

He’s an award-winning songwriter, record producer, DJ, and record label owner. He’s sold over 45 million records, has a residency in Ibiza, and has established himself as a global brand. 


In episode 179, we spoke to Jax about his incredible journey, how he was able to scale from a DJ to a business mogul, we covered the pros of artists selling their catalogs, and we also looked at the venture capital model as it relates to the music business. #jaxjones #musicbusiness #dj 


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/jaxjones?utm_medium=copy_link


For the latest in EYL Merch: https://www.earnyourleisure.com/collections/all

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
